appName: Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor
displayName: Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor
display_name: Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor
display_long_description:
Escape Together is a VR Escape Room game, that features both singleplayer and multiplayer.

Gather your best mystery solving team or go in alone, it's time to take on The Secrets Of The Professor...

The professor has invited you, his best students, to his house, but do you know what you are getting yourself into?

Help the professor, and uncover his secrets as you explore his house. BUT, be quick - the timer is ticking!

It looks like some agents followed you on your way to the house, and they don't seem friendly.

Good luck students, your professor is counting on you!

[media]
 
# Features

- **VR Crossplatform support**

You can play with all your friends no matter what VR headset they have!

- **Proximity chat**

 In-game proximity chat for increased immersion

- **Achievements and items**

For most achievement you unlock, you also unlock an item in the game
 
 
 
**A lot of puzzles in Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor are color based, which makes the game unsuitable for colorblind players**
